definition[0]: a long narrow seed container that grows on various plants, especially peas and beans
definition[1]: a part of a space vehicle that can be separated from the main part
definition[2]: a long narrow container for petrol or other substances, especially one carried under an aircraft wing
definition[3]: a group of sea animals, such as whales or dolphins, that swim together
definition[4]: a container which holds the eggs of some types of insects
